4Minute

Introduction

Ji Hyun is a Korean pop singer and an actress under Urban Works Entertainment. She was the leader and vocalist of the girl group 4minute under Cube Entertainment. She now goes by the name 'Son Jihyun' as she works as an actress.

On June 15, 2009, 4minute released their first digital song, "Hot Issue" marking her on-stage debut.

Jihyun then later on signed contract with Artist Company on September 30, 2016 after the disbandment of their group on June 13, 2016, and it was revealed at that time that her focus will be on acting promotions.

On March 9, 2020, Jihyun's signing with Wells Entertainment was made public.

FN Entertainment then declared on December 27, 2021, that Jihyun had rejoined the agency and will resume using her real name for promotions.

On August 8, 2022, It was revealed that Jihyun had signed contract with Urban Works Entertainment.
